resources.string: We do not accept cash.\nFind out why.

At MOMO Coffee, we are committed to the continuous improvement of our services and the safety of our customers and employees.
 That's why, by not handling cash:
 * We improve hygiene conditions and avoid product contamination.
 * We streamline our operations so you can receive your coffee in minutes.
 * We reduce risks associated with theft at the store and among our customers.
 We are committed to providing an efficient, safe, and modern shopping experience. For inquiries, feel free to contact us.
